name: The Future: A Right To Arms
name_original: The Future: A Right To Arms
description:
So it's kind of a play on words, arms and arms, see? And yeah, in the future people want your arms because they don't have them. Also the theme is "The Future with arms" yeah. If you are really stumped, try saying no a lot.
